summary:
This is my literature review of Printed artificial cilia from liquid-crystal network actuators modularly driven by light , which is written by Casper L. van Oosten, Cees W. M. Bastiaansen and Dirk J. Broer on Nature Materials.
Introduction of Basic Concepts Liquid Crystals Liquid crystals (LC) are materials with anisotropy, the position of molecules can be randomly arranged, which means it can flow like a liquid, but the molecules are fixed oriented.
title: Liquid Crystal Actuator and Ink-jet Print

summary:
Hello! I am Charles, welcome to my personal homepage in English. This is my personal website archiving my personal academic collection and works.
This static site is generated by Hugo and is deployed on Github Pages. This blog is using Clean White as the theme, thanks to zhaohuabing for such great works.
The head figure of website is taken by the Near-Infrared Camera (NIRCam) on NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope, it is the star-forming region NGC 3324 in the Carina Nebula.
title: About
